statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT subscription_type FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY subscription_type ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_name, location, subscription_type FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE subscription_type = 'Enterprise' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location LIKE 'San%' OR location LIKE 'Los%' ORDER BY location, age;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female' AND customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age < 25 OR customer_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE discount_percentage >= 10 AND target_customer_segment = 'Premium' ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, p.price, c.customer_name FROM products p JOIN purchases pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id WHERE pu.quantity > 2 ORDER BY p.price DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(pu.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pu.purchase_date FROM customers c, products p, purchases pu WHERE c.customer_id = pu.customer_id AND p.product_id = pu.product_id AND pu.quantity = 1 ORDER BY pu.purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM TransactionData WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductData ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, discount FROM PricingStrategies WHERE discount > 0.1 ORDER BY discount DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductData WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM TransactionData WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, discount FROM PricingStrategies
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_age ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' AND customer_age < 40
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, order_date, order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50
